mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(companynature) AS total,companynature FROM (SELECT company,companynature FROM job WHERE cityname='${value}' AND company!='' GROUP BY company)AS temp GROUP BY temp.companynature
SELECT count(scale) AS total,scale FROM (SELECT company,scale FROM job WHERE cityname='${value}' AND company!='' GROUP BY company)AS temp GROUP BY temp.scale ORDER BY scale
SELECT count(industry)AS total,industry FROM (SELECT industry FROM job WHERE cityname='${value}' AND company!='' GROUP BY company)AS temp GROUP BY temp.industry
SELECT AVG(minprice)AS minprice,AVG(maxprice)AS maxprice,exp FROM job WHERE cityname='${value}' AND exp!='' AND minprice!='' GROUP BY exp ORDER BY exp
SELECT AVG(minprice)AS minprice,AVG(maxprice)AS maxprice,education FROM job WHERE cityname='${value}' AND education!='' AND minprice!='' GROUP BY education ORDER BY education
SELECT SUM(substring_index(`demand`,'人',1))AS total,exp FROM job WHERE cityname='${value}' AND exp!='' GROUP BY exp ORDER BY exp
SELECT SUM(substring_index(`demand`,'人',1))AS total,education FROM job WHERE cityname='${value}' AND education!='' GROUP BY education ORDER BY education
